src.decorators package

Submodules

src.decorators.logging_service module

Singleton python based logging and execution logging decorator.

class src.decorators.logging_service.AppLogger(logger_name: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Singleton logging class using Dynaconf settings.

This class configures and provides a singleton logger instance that uses settings from a Dynaconf configuration.

Parameters:

logger_name (Optional[str]) – Optional name for the logger.

_instance

The singleton instance of the logger.

Type:

Optional[AppLogger]

_lock

A lock to ensure thread-safe instantiation.

Type:

threading.Lock

_initialized

Flag indicating if the logger has been initialized.

Type:

bool

src.decorators.logging_service.log_execution(func: T) → T[source]

Decorator that logs execution details of a function or method.

This includes entry, arguments, return value, execution time, and exceptions if any occur during execution.

Parameters:

func (T) – The function or method to be wrapped.

Returns:

The wrapped function with logging.

Return type:

T

Module contents

Initialize decorators package and expose public logging utilities.
